BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix pattern tests in release builds (#120879) (#120991) (cherry picked from commit 974c4e6242e92854982b0d96181ee72ed6a70edf)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Relax translog assertion for inference fields (#121092) The inference fields are synthesized from doc_values, regardless of whether the synthetic source is enabled. This change relaxes the translog assertions, allowing inference fields in the same way as we did with the synthetic source. Relates #120045 Closes #120979 Closes #121007 Closes #120980 Closes #120975
